modName: Towns and Villages Enhanced - Whiterun Snow BETA
summary: This experimental mod demonstrates how Whiterun were to look if it were subject to a snowy winter!
descriptionHtml:
===============================================================================

This experimental mod demonstrates how Whiterun were to look if it were subject to a snowy winter!

===============================================================================

PLEASE NOTE - This is not a season mod! It is just an insight into what Whiterun would look like, with seasonal changes. If you do not want the snow to be present, you will have to un-install the mod.

===============================================================================

[youtube]l0R9-SUYPYE[/youtube]

===============================================================================
Adds - 
Snow textures to (Nearly*) all items in Whiterun
General Winter Flora
Lighting

*Some items used outside of Whiterun have not been affected by Snow. This is to stop the texture appearing in
other locations around Tamriel. 

{NOT COMPATIBLE WITH TAVE WHITERUN/OTHER WHITERUN ENHANCEMENTS}
===============================================================================

If you notice any bugs, please send me an inbox on steam.

===============================================================================

For the Screenshots, I am using Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics ENB + Climates of Tamriel: Lite

===============================================================================

Please Subscribe, rate and comment! :D All suggestions are welcome!

===============================================================================

Others in the Towns and Villages Enhanced series! 

T.A.V.E Villages 
T.A.V.E Riverwood 
T.A.V.E Whiterun Exterior 
T.A.V.E Whiterun 
T.A.V.E Riften 
T.A.V.E Solitude 
T.A.V.E Windhelm 
T.A.V.E Falkreath 
T.A.V.E Markarth (Markarth Trees and Ruins)

Follow me on twitter to keep updated - AplestormyMods 

===============================================================================
author: Aplestormy
